Soil parameters

Source: vignettes/soil.Rmd
soil.Rmd

Parameters

Obtaining soil parameters for SWAT model can be difficult. Therefore package has function with allows automatic preparation of soil parameters. For this SOL_Z, CLAY, SAND, SILT and SOL_CNB parameters should be collected. All the rest will be filled by get_soil_parameters function.

library(svatools)
library(euptf2)
temp_path <- system.file("extdata", "soil_parameters.xlsx", package = "svatools")
soil <- get_soil_parameters(temp_path)
rm(suggested_PTF)
str(soil)
